Posts.Title: I sent out a test email to all who are on the.........

Posts.Content:
OH MK,
I am so sorry for all you are going through. There are a number of treatments other than chemo for bone mets. Hopefully this tech is very wrong and you won't have that to wrry about
. You and your family are in my prayers.
Hugs,
Angela
PS I had to re-register when I came back. Sorry for the confusion.
Posts.Title: Carolyn's bone scan, Friday afternoon, the tech is freaking

Posts.Content:
Make that 5. I had 5 FU too and am looking at my 8 year anniversary in May.
Good to talk to you all again .
I have missed you 
Hugs,
Angela Dula
